result.text:
I'm excited to share that I am officially a scout for a16z speedrun. The @speedrun scout program empowers some of a16z's strongest founders to invest in and support promising pre-seed and seed-stage founders in their network who could become candidates for a16z speedrun.   

This means I will be making angel investments on their behalf, ideally as first-money-in backing exceptional founding teams. My investment focus will be on early-stage companies in gaming and AI, aligned with the a16z speedrun thesis.   

If you're an amazing founder building something ambitious, or know a founder who is, my DMs are open.

result.text:
From Investing.com- @VWAVInc VisionWave  Holdings (Nasdaq:  $VWAV)  MoU with VEDA Aeronautics for Indian defense projects
"According to a statement based on the company‚Äôs SEC filing, the MoU, signed on Tuesday, outlines plans for joint participation in several major defense initiatives in India. These include the Drone Kill System (Make-2) for interceptor drone development, the ALTV (New Generation Light Tank) program involving 357 tanks, the FRCV (Main Battle Tank Program) for 1,770 main battle tanks, and the T72/T90 Retrofit Program for tanks.""

Under the agreement, VisionWave Holdings has been invited by VEDA to supply and develop core subsystems such as counter-unmanned aerial systems, tactical drones, radar technologies, advanced protection systems, sensor fusion technologies, and unmanned platforms for defense and homeland security applications. Both parties intend to jointly develop technical proposals, conduct demonstrations, and pursue contracts for these programs."

result.text:
grep (and lightweight semantic search) are all you need ü§î

When you have a ‚Äúmedium‚Äù sized dataset e.g. 1000 ArXiv PDFs, we found that an extremely strong Q&A baseline is just giving agents access to the CLI, along with some tools for fast semantic search using static embeddings.

These agents can answer complex questions, from simple search/filter with keywords, to those that require cross-referencing across docs, to those that require analysis across time.

In these cases standard RAG with fixed top-k retrieval is strictly worse.

We made file understanding + semantic search very CLI accessible through semtools, come check it out!

Blog by @LoganMarkewich : https://t.co/kYr8KkWLYR
SemTools: https://t.co/xg1iqbghIr

result.text:
OpenAI published "Why Language Models Hallucinate", explaining the root causes of AI hallucinations and proposing solutions to reduce them

- Language models hallucinate because standard training and evaluation procedures reward guessing over acknowledging uncertainty, with most evaluations measuring model performance in a way that encourages guessing rather than honesty about uncertainty since when models are graded only on accuracy, they are encouraged to guess rather than say "I don't know"

- Hallucinations originate during pretraining when models learn through pretraining, a process of predicting the next word in huge amounts of text without "true/false" labels attached to each statement, making it doubly hard to distinguish valid statements from invalid ones, especially for arbitrary low-frequency facts like a pet's birthday that cannot be predicted from patterns alone and lead to hallucinations

- The researchers conclude that accuracy-based evals need to be updated so that their scoring discourages guessing since if the main scoreboards keep rewarding lucky guesses, models will keep learning to guess, and that hallucinations are not inevitable because language models can abstain when uncertain

result.text:
Domestic violence is not just hitting.

It can be a way of speaking:
- Shut up
- Bitch
- F U
- Up your hole
- You are useless
- Ugly
- Fat
- You don't deserve to be happy
- Unequal distribution of labor
- Invalidating successes
- Withholding affection
- Frequent nitpicking
- Frequent shouting
- Never voicing appreciation
- Invading personal space
- Speaking in a threatening manner
- "I was just joking."
- Belittling
- Disgusting insults as jokes

Sometimes, perpetrators believe they love the victim but are unaware of their behavior.

Sometimes, perpetrators grew up in a household where such behavior is the norm and considered normal.

Characteristics of the victim:
- Low self-esteem
- Poor family support
- High levels of empathy
- High capacity for forgiveness
- Denial
- Rationalization
- Determination to make a marriage or a relationship work
- Believing he or she can 'fix things.'

Characteristics of the perpetrator:
- Often attachment difficulties
- Unstable attachment
- Low self-esteem
- Grew up in a physically or emotionally abusive household
- Maybe alcohol abuse
- May have an undiagnosed mental illness
- Identification with the aggressor ‚Äì reenacting childhood patterns
- Projections causing rage
- May have a childhood history of conduct disorder or oppositional defiant disorder
- May have frustration with career
- Fails to seek help
- Poor self-awareness
- Denial
- Rationalization
- Often polite and charming with others

Surprisingly,

Professional women are interestingly as likely to put up with verbal and milder physical abuse as those who are financially dependent.

Domestic violence isn‚Äôt always visible, but its impact is always real.

Counseling is often helpful to help both parties understand the dynamics of the relationship.

If you or someone you know is experiencing abuse, get help at https://t.co/DuOmSWbCmV.

Stranger Rape of a just 12 year old Girl leaving church ! 

Followed her after she left a church party,
He forced into some bushes and the Raped her 

Ghana-born Kofi Prempeh, 27, ignored the girl‚Äôs pleas to stop and attempts to push him off, Croydon Crown Court was told.

Prempeh, of Mitcham, has pleaded not guilty to two counts of rape in the park near Leighton Street, West Croydon on August 4, 2018.

Prosecutor Nicola Merrick told the jury the girl, who had only just turned 12, attended the party alone, with her family believing she would be safe amongst fellow-churchgoers they knew.
